channel.title: Comments on: A First Hand Report from flooded Pointe-aux-Chenes
channel.description: Because in all fairness, there is enough...

item.title: By: tamirus
item.dc:creator: tamirus
item.description: Hello. I am glad to find someone else who wants to talk about these tribes. I have been trying to gather information on the troubles that they are going through for a project that will raise awareness of the difficulties they are facing. I first became interested in these tribes during the Hurricane Katrina/Rita days and raised money at my college to help the Isle de Jean Charles band. I haven't been able to find much information about the impact of recent hurricanes and am very interested in your blog. Have you any more developments to share?
item.content:encoded:
Hello. I am glad to find someone else who wants to talk about these tribes. I have been trying to gather information on the troubles that they are going through for a project that will raise awareness of the difficulties they are facing. I first became interested in these tribes during the Hurricane Katrina/Rita days and raised money at my college to help the Isle de Jean Charles band. I haven’t been able to find much information about the impact of recent hurricanes and am very interested in your blog.
Have you any more developments to share?
